Mi reseña es que Dead By Daylight es un juego para divertirse y jugar con amigos, pese a que tiene varios bugs, aveces ni lo notas, y sus desarrolladores estan en constante mantenimiento del juego.
good job so far

I'm probably addicted to the game already with just 75h of playtime, in the beginning of playing it the first hours I got jumped scares almost every game!
Now I just be like.. "Yeah, I'm dead..." *starts with the A and D finger's position and clicks like my real life was in danger*
But yeah, pretty fun game with friends as well. Just try not to get mad at them if they don't go save your as.s ha-ha.
On the competitive side, I'm almost rank 12, I'm really trying to learn more about the game itself and get better.
So far it's a great game.
(besides the NOED) *coff*

The game is pleasing to play, even with all the toxicity and conflict between players; no denying of such.
my advice to new players would be to start off with a positive outlook and not to be involved in what appears to be a constant altercation between the killer side and the survivors or even amongst themselves.
as for the game itself, you play with the set of default survivors and a number of killers, but as you progress, you'd  be able to unlock more of each side simply by using in game currency, although there are some contents that require you to use actual money. Buy it, play it and enjoy it and mind you, don't be inclined to step into such immature arguments over what happens during a match as each and everyone might play by their own set of choices which is absolutely fine.

Dead by Daylight was introduced to me by my friends and I was immediately hooked by the game. This game gave me many thrills of hiding from the killer or even getting chased by the killer. Would be recommended to play with friends as it makes it even more enjoyable. However, the hitboxes are quite broken and 40% of the time we will be connected to a very laggy server.

I found this game back in 2016 when nurse was just introduced. I found out about the game just by scrolling on twitch. When I first saw the game I was immediately sucked into the entity by Nea and her spider like arms. I was force into the trials just as a baby Dwight wanting to jump into a locker. I first saw another person that looked to be friendly (meg) and they threw a pallet on my head; so I went to a locker and cried.
P.S. don't trust a meg.

This game will frustrate you beyond belief.

Survivours and Killers can DC at any time.

But more then that, Survivours can be very toxic. Blaming the killer for perks they use, if they camp, if they even dare to hurt a survivour.

The game fosters a competitive mindset, that brings out the worst in people, and the devs don't really care to make the game more interesting to negate this. They simply nerf whatever the vocal majority says. And care very little for the effect of always nerfing things.

There is no second gamemode. No 2v8. or anything that could be interestingly done with this framework.

Instead every 3 months the devs drop a new dlc killer and survivour. Bring nothing but new perks. But every map is the same exact thing. Do 5 gens to escape.

They couldn't even do something interesting like say, Turn on 5 water pumps to drain the exit. You know. ANYTHING to mix it up. 

Despite the bad community and bad game design in updates.

Games can be fun. I'd say about 20% of the time. The other 80% will leave you feeling like you shouldn't even bother playing the game.

El unico punto negativo que le pondria a este juego seria los asesinos nuevos que salen siempre lo sobrevaloran en poder y acabas viendo el nuevo asesino en todas las partidas y muy roto .

Lo otro negativo son muchos asesinos que te campean en el gancho esperando a que mueras y si eso pasa 1 y otra ve , acabas cansandote de querer jugarlo. Solo 2 cosas corre mas que el asesino o se tu el asesino :D

It took me a while to actually buy this game, but when I did and played it, I didn't regret it. It's a bit buggy at times, but normally as a killer main it just makes me laugh and go "wtf". It's a fun game to let out my anger a bit, going around hurling hatchets at people and usually getting at least one kill every lobby. I feel like once some of the odd bugs are fixed, it'll be a great game. 

TL: DR 7/10, a bit buggy but overall fun for me.

교장이랑 교사들 하나하나부서진 카타나로 잡아주고ㅋㅋㅋㅋㅋㅋㅋㅋㅋ

교문열고 도망칠려던 일진들 발자국남겨져서 살려달라고 싹싹 비는데

面白さを感じると思います。
NPCではなく、他の人が相手なので、トンネルやケバブなどされることもありますが、
その辺は仕方ないものとしてあきらめましょう。

Mas se vc pegar o jeito do jogo e jogar com amigos, vai ver que é muito legal.
E nem toda partida vai ser ruim, tem vezes que vc vai ter uma put@ "sorte" de pegar varias partidas horriveis, mas normalmente eu jogo de boa.
Muitos comentarios vai ser negativo n só por causa de lags e bugs, mas s pq o povo chora muito falando que o jogo é muito dificil e roubado pro killer..... n vejo onde esta escrito que o jogo era para ser facil e o povo que é muito lerdo e n sabe jogar.

Good game

Great game to play with friends. Updates are not always your friend, however they are quick to fix any mistakes they have made. Also, new killers are ALWAYS too OP but get fixed within a few days of their release. Perks are well balanced.  Love-Hate relationship at times but overall very fun.

このゲームは非常に面白く、私もお勧めはしていますが、買う前に無料プレイ期間で遊ぶか、返金前提で購入した方がいいでしょう。

よくキラーがサバイバーに煽られるゲームだと揶揄されて、またそれは事実なのですが、いわゆるお鯖様は敵であるキラーを煽るだけでなく、少しでも気に入らないことがあると、味方のサバイバーの足をわざと引っ張ります。とにかくサバイバーの民度が低いです。サバイバーの敵はキラーではなくマナーの悪いサバイバーであることを覚えておくと少し冷静になれます。

[strike] また、成長システムが非常に時間がかかるように設定されているため、イベントを待つかカニバルDLCを同時購入することを勧めます。 [/strike]

ログボ、アーカイブミッションの追加、プレステージの改善、バベチリのBPボーナス削除等々によりカニバルDLCは必須ではなくなりました。(個人的にはおすすめです)

またバランス調整により、ゴールデンタイムだと人が多すぎて全くマッチングしなかったサバイバー側のマッチ時間も、おそらく改善に向かっていくかと思われます。

I absolutely love this game. It is so much fun, and with all of the random people playing, it adds a nice element of suprise. It is even more fun to play as a group of friends and troll the killer or even to kill your friends. The onlyt warning I have is to not take the game seriously. Too many people do this, especially at high ranks. This just leads to saltiness and an unenjoyable game. Otherwise, I highly recomend this game to anyone.

Jogo massa para jogar com os amigos, muito divertido

Increible juego que te pone tenso al jugar como superviviente pero si juegas a cazar gente como asesino es muy divertido ver como corren, bueno yo recomiendo este juego ya que le ponen mucha atención ultimamente en estos años, hay contenido gratis por solo jugar y otros que necesitas comprar pero bueno que juego no tiene mini-transacciones, con amigos es super divertido hacer enojar al asesino ya que tienes buena comunicación y las mayorias de las veces puedes escapar, hay mucha variedad de habilidades, personajes y escenarios.

te preocupa que si hay nuevo dlc ya no podras jugar con ellos o tus amigos pues dejame decirte relajate, podras jugar en el mapa nuevo pero no tendras los personajes solo eso y ni te preocupes de sus habilidades las puedes comprar con moneda del juego en el santuario.

a que esperas para comprarlo solo o con amigos es muy divertido.

dada vez mejoran más y más el juego espero mucha comunidad se genere con todas estas mejoras y claro el crossplay entre microsoft, mas plataformas para jugar y cada vez mejoran su contenido :3

EDIT: actualmente le meten muchas actualizaciones al juego, ya sean reworks visuales, mecanicas, cambios a las perks o habilidades de los personajes, grandes personajes originales y tambien asombrosas licencias de asesinos epicos de peliculas y videojuegos, me encanta jugar este juego ya sea solo o con amigos, es mas divertido con amigos.
tambien metieron crossplay con ps, xbox y creo nintendo, esto es genial ya que hay mas gente y las colas de espera ya casi no existen.
puntos malos, los hitboxes son super raros y malos cuando no deberia pegarte lo hacen, tambien se supone que con los servidores dedicados a 60 hrz ya no existiria este tipo de problemas sorpresa no son tan dedicados porque el killer tiene prioridad es decir que si esta super lag el killer o usa lagswitch te puede pegar a KM de distancia ya que todo gira entorno a la conexion del killer pero si cambian a que sea todo por el servidor dedicado creo que todo esto acabaria con los tramposos lagswitchers

Fantastic co-op horror game that offers two completely separate experiences in one.... when the frightening veneer of being a survivor wears off, you're left with an interesting survival experience with a really good depth. And playing as a killer is a completely different experience, as if you're playing a really neat game of tag.

EDIT: was mostly a survivor main, almost exclusively played survivor up to this point. Theyve now added in a Rift which is a like their version of a battle pass. Its encouraged me to play more killer and I must say it's a fresh experience playing as killer more and being able to re-dive into mechanics I was only familiar with through completely different eyes.

It's good fun, and this game will continue to get updated with new content by a dev team that seems to care about the game. Well worth it's 20 dollar asking price, and most certainly worth a sale.
